every piece and -> merchant : 1
piece and merchant -> ogyris : 1
and merchant ogyris -> had : 1
merchant ogyris had -> set : 1
ogyris had set -> them : 1
had set them -> one : 1
set them one -> by : 1
them one by -> one : 1
one by one -> in : 1
by one in -> this : 1
one in this -> vast : 1
in this vast -> there : 1
this vast there -> were : 1
vast there were -> hundreds : 1
there were hundreds -> of : 1
were hundreds of -> the : 1
hundreds of the -> crystal : 1
of the crystal -> the : 1
the crystal the -> cost : 1
crystal the cost -> must : 1
the cost must -> have : 1
cost must have -> been : 1
have been was -> still : 1
been was still -> staring : 1
still staring in -> awe : 1
staring in awe -> at : 1
in awe at -> the : 1
awe at the -> crystal : 1
at the crystal -> flowers : 1
the crystal flowers -> when : 1
crystal flowers when -> a : 1
flowers when a -> hand : 1
when a hand -> fell : 1
a hand fell -> on : 1
hand fell on -> his : 1
fell on his -> the : 1
his the author -> of : 1
the author of -> more : 1
author of more -> than : 1
of more than -> ninety : 1
more than ninety -> books : 1
than ninety books -> for : 1
ninety books for -> adults : 1
books for adults -> and : 1
for adults and -> including : 1
adults and including -> the : 1
and including the -> new : 1
including the new -> york : 1
the new york -> times : 1
new york times -> bestselling : 1
york times bestselling -> faerie : 1
times bestselling faerie -> the : 1
bestselling faerie the -> first : 1
faerie the first -> book : 1
the first book -> in : 1

the faerie wars -> which : 1
faerie wars which -> was : 1
wars which was -> followed : 1
